title: Zip Images and Upload Them to Google Drive On Windows With AskUI
excerpt: This tutorial will show you how to zip files on your filesystem and then upload them to Google Drive on Windows OS. The goal is to show you a lot o ..
content:
Using visual selectors and automation on OS level often feels confusing at first.

Prerequisites

    You are working from Windows Operating System
  • Create a folder Copy some images to it
  • miniature so the images show a little preview
  • Link to a Google Drive Folder
  • Google Chrome that opens Google Chrome

After running the test/my-first-askui-test-suite.test.ts. In this file, add a new test inside the body of the callback passed to the describe function:

Next, we want to click on the folder where our images are stored and open it.
Select the first image and then use the shortcut Ctrl + A to select all images in the folder.
Now we minimize the window and find the shortcut with the word Navigate to Google Drive
Enter-Key is pressed.
Find Zip-File and Upload
File upload, navigate to our zip-file location and upload it.
To run this automation use the npx jest test/my-first-askui-test-suite.test.ts --config ./test/jest.config.ts command.
If you would like to watch a video of this tutorial. Here you go:
 Please accept marketing-cookies to watch this video. 
 
If you have a recurring or persisting issue, donâ€™t hesitate to ask the community for help!
author: johannes-dienst
